text: Hulot () may refer to: ==People== * Anatole Hulot (1811–1891), French civil servant * Nicolas Hulot (born 1955), French ecologist ==Places== * Hulot Peninsula, Antarctica ==Other== * Monsieur Hulot, title character in Les Vacances de Monsieur Hulot by Jacques Tati ==See also== * Jean-Marie Hullot (1954-2019), French computer scientist
title: Hulot
